title: This one w...
description: This one was okay, but it's not something I'm going to seek out again in the future.  I thought the setting and premise of the game was interesting, but there's not really any intrigue or meat there for me. In the end, I didn't really enjoy playing it, I was just going through the motions and there wasn't anything challenging or interesting about the game in the end once you get over the initial intrigue.
